name: EphraimTalkInnes
_source: speak;Innes;It's been a long time, Ephraim.
speak;Innes;You arrived sooner than I'd expected.|Eirika is safe.|You've no need to worry.
speak;Ephraim;I've heard that you've been watching over Eirika.|I would like to offer you my gratitude.
speak;Innes;It's not necessary.|Besides, there's still a war to be won.|We can't rest easy till every last Grado soldier's been defeated.
